name: Spwarp
description:
Spwarp - A game by the Eclectic team for the Bored Pixels Jam 4 "Time Travel"

The Team:

  • Coders: mesler1 (aka Xedius) and Arkness
  • Art: mesler1, Erizur and nukenukenuke
  • Audio: mbg180 (listen to our game's music here)

It was just a mining expedition. Blast off, shoot rocks, go home. 

That was until you saw it. A black hole. 

You knew that it was already too late. It pulled you in, and your ship was enveloped by its orange ring. "What lies beyond the event horizon?" you wonder.

You wake up feeling slightly dizzy. You and your ship appear to be in a perfectly normal state, until you felt it. Something felt different. It felt weird, but you knew that you had a unique power-- you can somehow control time, with a small range of about 3 seconds.

You were far from home, in an enemy territory surrounded by hostile ships.  You set your navigation system for Earth. It's time to blast off.
